![Paket](https://i.cloudup.com/SI5YQncxCK-3000x3000.png)

***Npm global packages list***


## Install

```
npm install -g paket
```

## Usage
```
paket

  > apidoc
  > atom-shell
  > chromeos-apk
  > cli-github
  > component
  > dox
  > forever
  > gifify
  > gitlet
  > imaging
  > is-online
  > is-up
  > mocha
  > pageres
  > rendr-cli
  > rimraf
  > spot
  > trayballoon
  > updatehammer
  > vulcanize
  > yo
```
**new command**
```sh
paket json 
```

#### Requires
  * [npm](https://github.com/npm/npm) 
  * [jq](https://github.com/stedolan/jq)
